DOC.brief_summary: The Departments of Neurology and Neurosurgery are conducting this research study to evaluate the safety and effectiveness of intravascular angioplasty for the treatment of venous narrowing in the treatment of Multiple Sclerosis (MS).
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Randomized Endovascular Therapy in Multiple Sclerosis - PREMiSE
